instruction: take a right, walk forward. exit the toilet to the stairs. walk forward. exit the stairs to the hallway. take a right, walk forward. exit the hallway to the lounge
turn left, walk straight down the right side of the plant. exit the entryway to the hallway. take a left, exit the hallway to the spa. walk forward. wait at the right of the massage bed
turn right, walk forward. go straight with the carpet on your left. exit the lounge to the hallway. exit the hallway to the dining room
